introduction.p: In this chapter we will study the class of graphs called trees. Trees are frequently used in both mathematics and the sciences. Our solution of is one simple instance. Since they are often used to illustrate or prove other concepts, a poor understanding of trees can be a serious handicap. For this reason, our ultimate goals are to: (1) define the various common types of trees, (2) identify some basic properties of trees, and (3) discuss some of the common applications of trees.
